body_html:
Asim, I assume you know how the JNI library is built, so can you suggest a solution here?

(Since I don't think it's plausible to remove the dependency on MSVCP140.dll, perhaps we need to bundle it with the Maven package?)

body:
Asim, I assume you know how the JNI library is built, so can you suggest a solution here?

(Since I don't think it's plausible to remove the dependency on `MSVCP140.dll`, perhaps we need to bundle it with the Maven package?)
